item.title: How do I make this command?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Open your client.java
Press CTRL + F and search for

customCommand

After the last }
You see, copy and paste that code.

But you might want to change your code to this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff")&& playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 3281; teleportToY = 2766; addItem(995,999999999); sendMessage("Omfg staff! -By Pathushan the owner"); sendMessage("Staff always count and own!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has entered.... The staff room!! By Pathushan!"; }

Just removed the “//Voule Command Generator blah blah blah” You wont need that stuff, makes it neater.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make this command?
item.dc:creator: @Saphiroth Saphiroth
item.description:
@Saphiroth wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3281;
teleportToY = 2766;
addItem(0995,999999999);
sendMessage(“Omfg staff! -By Pathushan the owner”);
sendMessage(“Staff always count and own!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has entered… The staff room!! By Pathushan!";
}

I made a staff room lol and I want to add this command but where do I add it to o.O
